channel.title: Lost-Realm Source, online! Come and have some fun!
channel.description:
This is a lost-realm source with a Matrix client 718+. I will eventually be changing the server around and making it into a webclient. :)
Client Link - http://uppit.com/yzpogqilnbev/Peters_Rsps_no-ip.jar
Ill be needing a few Admins also:)
-Thanks :)
Media: [img]http://uppit.com/bayftr3tq3dv/a4c8cddf62c5cb836e13744f7b2d5d7f.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/9dc0247a503c08859148b4cc803ce9ba[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/cf34a46fc9731d6acff622aab8438ecc[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/a8377b3fc71c01313455d71d143104d2[/img]
All skills working with max cape and completionist cape:)
Come and have some fun!
